column1: Local Foods////I was also very pleased with the sides. I went with the kale (which included a healthy amount of pine nuts tossed in...YUM) and the beets. Both were light and refreshing and made me feel healthier than I actually am! I washed it all down with the "mintade"
column2: which was a fresh squeezed blend of different citrus fruits. There wasn't really anything "minty" about it
column3: but it was still really good.
